ollamaIp.label: Ollama Server IP
ollamaIp.help: IP address or hostname of the direct Ollama server (for status monitoring).

ollamaPort.label: Ollama Server Port
ollamaPort.help: Port of the direct Ollama server (default: 11434).

openWebUIIp.label: OpenWebUI Server IP
openWebUIIp.help: IP address or hostname of the OpenWebUI server.

openWebUIApiKey.label: OpenWebUI API Key
openWebUIApiKey.help: API Key for OpenWebUI authentication (Bearer Token). Get it from Settings > Account in OpenWebUI.

checkOllamaModelRunning.label: Check model status interval
checkOllamaModelRunning.help: Timer to check model availability via direct Ollama connection. Set to 0 to disable.

useVectorDb.label: Use Qdrant
useVectorDb.help: Use Qdrant as vector database for Ollama.

vectorDbIp.label: Qdrant Server IP
vectorDbIp.help: IP address or hostname of the Qdrant server.

embeddingModel.label: Embedding Model
embeddingModel.help: Model to use for generating embeddings.

maxContextResults.label: Max Context Results
maxContextResults.help: Maximum number of context results to include in queries.

enableDatapointControl.label: Enable Datapoint Control
enableDatapointControl.help: Allow AI models to control ioBroker datapoints via function calls.
